_sText:
ze_sonic_contamination_v1_Incomplet

***********
This is the incompleted version 1 of the sonic contamination, created by me and Thomasddq. To get the completed version, you can visite my siteweb http://www.nfaith.co.nr/ (and soon on the Mapocalyps Siteweb). 

But what is the difference of the incompleted version and the completed?
Well , in the completed you got sonic models and in the incompleted, instead of the model you got some picture. Because, by the rules of fpsbanana and the big ***** on the beta 3, we can't post it on fpsb, so on this siteweb there will be only the sonic model free version.

***********
Hint:
Some walls aren't walls, and computers can be usefull

***********
Author:
Sardox (me) - Gameplay Mapping
Thomasddq   - Detail Mapping (I want to thks him a lot because without him you would got such little detail.)
Pqnix       - Texture (The grass)

Thanks:
Fighter111  - For giving us the idea.
Deathrunisbest - The beta 3 testing, and good feedback

***********
Ze_sonic_contamination:
V1: 
+ A New Building in the final phase
+ Better Deadend (Don't worry, Better doesn't mean More)
+ Realisme
+ Better Graphisme
+ The tower remaked
+ First Vehicul remaked
+ Final Spaceship remaked
+ Better Skybox with a animation at the end
+ Button Protection to slow down zombie
+ Playable

b3:
+ Public Released
+ Playable
- Trashed 

Beta2:
+ Map Half finished
- Bad Gameplay
- No Buyzone
- No Ending
- Unplayable

Beta1:
+ The biggest work made it
- Unplayable

***********
Conception:
The map is based on a spiral proceed,so we can gain spaces and it can let us to improve the map look.

***********
Link:
http://www.nfaith.co.nr
http://mapocalypse.nitroserv.net/indexuk.php 
http://www.fpsbanana.com/studios/32935

Question?, comments?, ideas? Tell us!
